name: Nmilo o mantihosh
description:
Nmilo O Mantihosh is an adventure-survival game where you play as a drunk guy whose goal is to reach the refregirator to get an additional beer. 

This game is made in 48 hours as a submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. This year's theme is Out Of Control so basically the player is out of control. He is drunk ! Duuuh !

Features

  • 4 levels at home
  • 1 level where you have to cross the streets that is full of cars
  • The final level is a zombie top down shooter. You shoot bottles, the guy is drunk, Duuh again !
  • Respect the timer of each level
  • A fun game with funky controls

Have fun trying to beat it ;)
